artist: Artist: Arthur Rackham; Author: Various authors; Publisher: J. B. Lippincott Company, Philadelphia; Printer: R. and R. Clark, Ltd., Edinburgh
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
description: binding: red fabric; silk-screened lettering and designs in blue and white; endpapers: cream wove color-printed design; 287 pp. (excluding illustrations)
markings: pencil drawings in front and back pages, added by owner
medium: Reproductions of watercolors and pen and ink drawings
title: The Arthur Rackham Fairy Book
